section.p: This section provides sample lifecycle EDRs for different scenarios.

p.b: Current validity time of Account is increased

fig.codeblock: ------------------------------------- CDR length: 442 Release ID | Version ID: 7|2 Data record format | TS number: 1|7 Release identifier extension: 0 Name Tag Data RecordType 0 LIFECYCLE_RECORD invokedBy 1 webService invokedMethod 1 updateScheduledTime entityType 1 ACCOUNT_TYPE entityId 1 PersonalAccount72511 lifeCycleType 1 ENTITY lifeCycleName 1 AccountEntityLC_72414 adjustMode 1 SET periodUnitType 1 DAYS periodValue 1 7 inputDateTime 1 22/11/2018 10:41:07 oldDateTime 1 28/11/2018 12:45:22 newDateTime 1 22/11/2018 10:41:07 timeStamp 1 22/11/2018 10:40:07 result 1 SUCCESS RecordTimestamp 1 22/11/2018 05:10:07

p.b: Current validity time of Subscription is increased

fig.codeblock: CDR length: 583 Release ID | Version ID: 7|2 Data record format | TS number: 1|7 Release identifier extension: 0 Name Tag Data RecordType 0 LIFECYCLE_RECORD invokedBy 1 webService invokedMethod 1 updateScheduledTime entityType 1 SUBSCRIPTION_TYPE entityId 1 Personal_Bundle72508 lifeCycleType 1 PERIOD lifeCycleName 1 SubscriptionPeriodicLC_72414 subscriptionSource 1 DEVICE subscriptionSourceId 1 DeviceId72508 subscriptionId 1 6f1518f9-ac43-4db1-897d-fa42d4c9b7c8 adjustMode 1 DECR periodUnitType 1 HOURS periodValue 1 -14 inputDateTime 1 23/11/2018 03:30:00 oldDateTime 1 24/11/2018 05:30:00 newDateTime 1 23/11/2018 03:30:00 timeStamp 1 22/11/2018 04:55:00 result 1 SUCCESS RecordTimestamp 1 22/11/2018 11:25:00
